campaigns.title: Noches de Margarita

copy.social_media:
🍹 MARGARITA NIGHTS ARE BACK! 🍹

Experience the heat with our signature Margarita Ardiente. Premium tequila, perfectly balanced spice.

2x1 every Thursday night! 🌶️

📍 Margarita Pinta, Cl 20 #40A-10
#MargaritaPinta #Pasto #Cocteleria #NightLife
copy.email_body:
Hola!

Ready for something different? Our Margarita Ardiente is waiting for you.

Join us this Thursday for 2x1 on all Margaritas. The perfect start to your weekend.

Cheers,
Margarita Pinta Team

campaigns.expected_impact: 30% increase in cocktail revenue, higher social engagement
campaigns.rationale: Leveraging the brand name 'Margarita' with our top Star product.

campaigns.title: Hervido Experience
campaigns.objective: Promote local fusion drinks (Question Mark -> Star)
campaigns.target_audience: Locals looking for comfort drinks with a twist

copy.social_media:
🔥 HERVIDO COMO NUNCA ANTES 🔥

Tradición Nariñense + Tequila Premium = La perfección.

Ven a probar nuestro Hervido con Tequila. El calorcito que necesitas esta noche.

#Pasto #Tradicion #Hervido #Nariño #MargaritaPinta
copy.email_body:
It's cold outside, but we've got you covered.

Discover our unique twist on the Nariño classic: Hervido con Tequila.

Perfect for sharing with friends on a chilly Pasto evening.

campaigns.expected_impact: Convert local curiosity into sales, establish a unique selling point
campaigns.rationale: Capitalizes on local 'Hervido' tradition but adds a premium twist to align with gastrobar identity.

campaigns.title: After Office Chill
campaigns.objective: Drive traffic during early evening with Cash Cows

copy.social_media:
🍻 AFTER OFFICE AT MARGARITA PINTA 🍻

Rough day? We've got ice-cold Coronas and loaded Nachos waiting.

Combo: 2 Coronas + Nachos Supreme for $55k.

#AfterOffice #Pasto #Cerveza #Relax
copy.email_body:
Work's done. Time to relax.

Grab your colleagues and head over for our After Office special:
Bucket of Coronas + Nachos for a special price.

See you at 5!

campaigns.expected_impact: Fill tables during pre-dinner hours, increase average ticket size
campaigns.rationale: Bundling high-margin Nachos with high-volume Beer to boost early evening occupancy.

thought_process: Campaigns focused on reinforcing the 'Gastrobar' identity. 1. Anchor campaign on the namesake product (Margarita). 2. Innovation campaign on local fusion (Hervido). 3. Volume campaign for off-peak hours (After Office).
